# Create a new AWS Instance

Create an AWS Instance with the following specifications:

|   Parameter   |                   Value                    |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| AMI           | Amazon Linux 2 AMI (ami-04681a1dbd79675a5) |
| Instance Type | t2.medium                                  |
| Storage       | 25 GiB root volume, Delete on Termination  |
